name: Tahoe Donner Golf Course
description: Tahoe Donner Golf Course offers a truly unique mountain golfing experience, set amid the breathtaking scenery of the Sierra Nevada. Blending seamlessly with its natural surroundings, the course features tree-lined fairways, strategic elevation changes, and fast, well-maintained greens. The crisp mountain air and stunning vistas add to the enjoyment, while the peaceful, secluded setting almost golf a second thought of the day. With a reputation for excellent course conditions and a welcoming atmosphere, it’s a must-play destination for those who appreciate both the game and the beauty of high-altitude golf.

faqs.question: What’s included in Tahoe Donner golf group packages?
faqs.answer: Lodging, pre-booked tee times at Tahoe Donner, carts, and concierge planning. Optional transportation and dining add-ons.

faqs.question: How much do Tahoe Donner packages cost?
faqs.answer: Typical range is $139–$329 per golfer depending on season, lodging selection, and group size.

faqs.question: Do you handle corporate or tournament groups?
faqs.answer: Yes—room blocks, tee-time blocks, tournament setup, and logistics for corporate and leisure groups.

bodyText: Play Tahoe Donner in Truckee with golf groups, tee times, and stay-and-play packages. Expert planning for buddies, corporate, and leisure trips.

Tahoe Donner Golf Course offers a truly unique mountain golfing experience, set amid the breathtaking scenery of the Sierra Nevada. Blending seamlessly with its natural surroundings, the course features tree-lined fairways, strategic elevation changes, and fast, well-maintained greens. The crisp mountain air and stunning vistas add to the enjoyment, while the peaceful, secluded setting almost golf a second thought of the day. With a reputation for excellent course conditions and a welcoming atmosphere, it’s a must-play destination for those who appreciate both the game and the beauty of high-altitude golf.
Tahoe Donner Golf Course is located in Truckee, California, set in the Sierra Nevada mountains just minutes from Lake Tahoe.

As one of the oldest championship courses in the Tahoe Basin, it offers tree-lined fairways, elevation changes, and pristine fast greens surrounded by mountain views — a true high-altitude golf experience.

Golfers enjoy an 18-hole par 72 course, a driving range, short game practice facility, putting greens, practice bunkers, a fully stocked pro shop with rentals, lessons and clinics, plus dining at
The Lodge Restaurant & Pub
.

Yes. Golf the High Sierra creates packages that include lodging, tee times at Tahoe Donner, and even multi-course combos with nearby
Coyote Moon Golf Course
.
Request your package here »

Summer tee times fill up quickly due to the strong membership base. We recommend booking early through Golf the High Sierra to secure preferred times.

facilities: Driving Range : A dedicated area to practice and perfect your swing before hitting the course.
Short Game Practice Facility : Designed to help golfers improve their chipping and putting skills.
Golf Pro Shop : Fully stocked with the latest golf equipment, apparel, and accessories.
Golf Club Rentals : Premium clubs available for rent, catering to both beginners and seasoned players.
Private Lessons and Group Clinics : Professional instruction tailored to individual or group needs to enhance golfing skills.
The Lodge Restaurant & Pub : A dining venue adjacent to the golf course, offering excellent food and drinks in a relaxed atmosphere.

tips.title: The Hack!
tips.content:
No better day can be spent that pairing a round at Tahoe Donner Golf Course with a round at Coyote Moon Golf Course, located just 5 minutes away.  Grab a quick bite at The Lodge at Tahoe Donner in between rounds.  The food is great!
Book your tee times well in advance to play Tahoe Donner!  With a robust membership, summer tee times go quickly!

tips.title: Golf The High Sierra
tips.content: Book your next group golf trip with us!

pointOfView: Tahoe Donner Golf Course is one of the oldest golf championship golf courses in the Lake Tahoe Basin. It is a true challenge for any golfer and a lovely introduction to the sport for those just starting. It is truly a walk, or ride, through the forest. Accurate shot-making is always the order of the day, especially off the tee. We wish it was open longer each year, but it's elevation brings snow early, and it stay late into spring, so play the course from mid-June to late-September for the best conditions.
contentParagraphs: Play Tahoe Donner in Truckee with golf groups, tee times, and stay-and-play packages. Expert planning for buddies, corporate, and leisure trips.
Located at over 6,000 feet elevation, the thin air reduces wind resistance, allowing golf balls to travel farther, making every well-struck shot feel even more powerful and rewarding.

One of the most memorable holes at Tahoe Donner Golf Course is the signature 18th hole, a stunning par-4 that provides a dramatic finish to the round. This challenging hole features an elevated tee shot that offers breathtaking views of the surrounding Sierra landscape, tempting golfers to unleash a powerful drive.

No better day can be spent that pairing a round at Tahoe Donner Golf Course with a round at Coyote Moon Golf Course, located just 5 minutes away. Grab a quick bite at The Lodge at Tahoe Donner in between rounds. The food is great!
Book your tee times well in advance to play Tahoe Donner! With a robust membership, summer tee times go quickly!

featuredHole.title: Hole #14 — Par 4
featuredHole.description: A narrow, tree-lined par 4 that demands a well-placed tee shot. The green is elevated and sloped — approaches that miss long are gone. One of Tahoe Donner's most demanding holes.
